description: This document outlines the design and functionality requirements for building a single-page marketing agency website based on the provided design mockups. The goal is to create a modern, clean, and engaging user experience with smooth animations and full responsiveness.

generalInstructions.frameworkSuggestion: React (Next.js) or a similar modern JavaScript framework is recommended for component-based architecture. Use a CSS-in-JS solution like Styled Components or a utility-first framework like Tailwind CSS for styling.

responsiveness.target: The website must be fully responsive and adapt seamlessly to all device sizes, from mobile phones (vertical) to desktops.
responsiveness.behavior: Grids (e.g., Services, Team) should stack into a single column on mobile devices. Font sizes and spacing should adjust accordingly. Ensure navigation is mobile-friendly, possibly using a hamburger menu.
responsiveness.typography: Follow the mobile-specific typography guidelines provided in the style guide.

animations.onScroll: Implement subtle fade-in or slide-in animations for sections and elements as the user scrolls down the page. This adds a dynamic feel.
animations.onHover: All interactive elements (buttons, cards, links) should have clear hover states. For example, cards could slightly scale up or have a shadow effect. Buttons could change color or brightness.
animations.transitions: Ensure all state changes, like the accordion expanding or hover effects, are smooth with a transition duration of approximately 0.3s.

assetLinks.font: The font used is 'Positivus'. A link is provided in the style guide image: 'You can find font here'. This should be implemented via `@font-face` or a font service.
assetLinks.illustrations: Illustrations are credited to 'Igor Kapustin' and 'vectorjuice on Freepik'. All illustrations from the mockups should be exported as optimized SVGs to ensure they are crisp and lightweight.

uiElements.buttons: Buttons have two main styles: dark background with light text, and lime green background with dark text. They should have rounded corners and a slight hover effect.
uiElements.cards: Cards feature prominently throughout the design. They have distinctly rounded corners and a clean, consistent border style.

components.name: Navigation Links
components.details: Links for 'About us', 'Services', 'Use Cases', 'Pricing', 'Blog'. These should be smooth-scroll links that navigate to the corresponding sections on the page.

components.name: CTA Button
components.details: 'Request a quote' button with an outlined style (white background, dark border).

pageStructure.behavior: The header should remain fixed at the top of the viewport as the user scrolls.

components.name: Main Headline
components.details: Large H1 text: 'Navigating the digital landscape for success'.

components.name: Subtext
components.details: A paragraph describing the agency's services.

components.name: CTA Button
components.details: 'Book a consultation' button with a dark background.

components.name: Illustration
components.details: A large, stylized megaphone illustration on the right side.

components.name: Client Logos
components.details: A row of logos for social proof: amazon, dribbble, HubSpot, Notion, NETFLIX, zoom.

pageStructure.description: A grid layout showcasing the agency's key services.

components.name: Service Card
components.details: Six cards, each representing a service (SEO, PPC, Social Media, Email Marketing, Content Creation, Analytics). Cards have a title, an illustration, and a 'Learn more' link. The design alternates between light and dark card backgrounds.

pageStructure.layout: A single large card with a light gray background.

components.name: Headline
components.details: 'Let's make things happen'.

components.details: A short paragraph encouraging users to get in touch.

components.name: CTA Button
components.details: 'Get your free proposal' button.

pageStructure.description: Showcases successful projects to build credibility.

pageStructure.description: An interactive accordion explaining the agency's methodology.
pageStructure.layout: A vertically stacked list of expandable items.

functionality.behavior: Clicking a title (or its plus/minus icon) expands its content while collapsing any other open item. The first item ('Consultation') should be open by default. The active/open item has a lime green background.

components.name: Accordion Item
components.details: Six items, each with a number, a title (e.g., 'Consultation'), and a description paragraph that is hidden until expanded.

components.name: Team Member Card
components.details: Each card includes a photo with a green graphic overlay, name, title, a clickable LinkedIn icon, and a short bio.

components.name: View All Button
components.details: A 'See all team' button centered below the grid.
